name: Daredevils Fall
description:
Are you daring enough to brave the falls? Find out in this one-of-a-kind aquatic simulator. Rush down the raging rapids before being hurled over the mighty falls - and try to stay alive doing it!

Features:

  • Play in the waters of the Niagara River leading up to and over Niagara Falls, built from high-resolution real-world data.
  • Reactive water physics in a gorgeous natural sandbox
  • Choose from different Character, Time of Day and Weather presets.

How to Play:

BE SURE TO PICK ROWBOAT FOR YOUR VESSEL

BE SURE TO CLICK AT LEAST ONCE ON THE WATER BEFORE CLICKING 'START'

With the above in mind, your goal in Daredevils Fall is simply to reach the pool at the bottom of the falls safely. If you land anywhere outside the rowboat, the game is over - but your ragdoll will continue downstream! If you see the 'Game Over' and 'You Win!' screens at the same time, it's up to you to decide how to interpret it, but we call it winning! Also, the bug fix for this is coming after the game jam :-)
